text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Right, I think that's enough for<n>today's... Hm?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Something wrong?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: No, but it seems we have a spectator.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: An acquaintance of yours, I presume?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Nope. But if I remember correctly...

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Phew. Another honest day's work!<n>And now, the event
we've all been<n>waiting for—Roll the McQueen!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I beg your pardon?! What adreadful-sounding name! Whatever itis, we are not doing it!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Hey! Come back here!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: I didn't know her, but I had seenher around. She was always the lastone out practicing.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: And there she was, running and<n>running, all by herself.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant... Ah!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Thud!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Hnngh... Ow...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: All this running, and nothing to show<n>for it...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It was like watching McQueen all over<n>again, training for the
Tenno Sho as if<n>her life depended on it.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: You okay?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: You okay?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Huh? Oh... You're McQueen's<n>trainer...

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
You shouldn't run through the pain.<n>Not if you want to win
your next race.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
You shouldn't run through the pain.<n>Not if you want to win
your next race.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: It sucks you can't do more now,I know. But just hold on to thatfeeling, and it'll take you to thewinner's circle.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Sniffle... Sob...

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Whoa, uh... Didn't think you hurt<n>yourself that badly.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Whoa, uh... Didn't think you hurt<n>yourself that badly.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: N-no, sorry, it's... it's just...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
I love running... but I just can't seem<n>to win. And when I
see McQueen<n>race—

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I... I want to win too!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
"I want to win." It's easy to say<n>those words once. But to
Rice Shower,<n>they were a mantra.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Me? In the Derby...

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
I know you can do it. I've watched<n>you run more than
anyone.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
I know you can do it. I've watched<n>you run more than
anyone.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: B-but... I'm just not at that level.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I can't blame her for being<n>intimidated. The Derby draws
the<n>fiercest contenders around.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Still, Rice has the legs to keep up with<n>McQueen. And more
importantly...
choice_data_list: You still want to win, don't you?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Ah...

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
That ambition is what leads to hard<n>work. And hard work is
what leads to<n>confidence.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: So what do you say? The Derby calls!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: ...O-okay. I'll give it a try.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It took a little prodding, but she's<n>taken her first step
towards the wide<n>world that awaits her.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: So all I have to do is follow McQueen?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Yep. Just follow the leader, no matter<n>what.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Yep. Just follow the leader, no matter<n>what.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Out of all the contenders for this<n>year's Derby, there's one
clear<n>favorite: the undefeated Mihono<n>Bourbon.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
She takes the lead and sets a precise<n>pace, rather like a
machine. It's truly a<n>sight to behold.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
If you're to best her, you'll first need<n>to be able to keep up
with me.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: ...Okay. I'll try my best not to fall<n>behind.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It's not easy, keeping the perfect<n>stalking distance. It
demands both<n>stamina and focus, especially against<n>
someone like McQueen.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Rice gets off to a rough start, falling<n>behind time and time
again, but she<n>keeps at it. And after a few days...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Huff... Puff...

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Hey, look at that! You didn't fall<n>behind a single time today!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Well done. That stamina will serve<n>you well.
choice_data_list:
Just like that! That's how you're gonna win the
Derby!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Y-yeah!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Well then, farewell to you all.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Smell ya later!

text_block_list.name: Upbeat Umamusume
text_block_list.text: See you tomorrow!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Just keep following, just keep<n>following...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Just keep following, just keep<n>following...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Sigh...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Just keep following, just keep<n>following...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: ...Erm, Rice.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Hweh?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Do you mean to sleep beside meagain? I'm not sure following meeverywhere I go will benefityou...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: B-but Trainer said to follow you, no<n>matter what.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: (...This is most definitely not what<n>Trainer had in mind.)

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
After several days of relentless<n>training, the highlight of the
Twinkle<n>Series, the Japanese Derby, is finally<n>here.
